biotools.summary: Protein secondary structure detection in intermediate-resolution cryo-EM maps using deep learning | Emap2sec is a computational tool to identify protein secondary structures | Emap2sec is a computational tool using deep learning that can accurately identify protein secondary structures, alpha helices, beta sheets, others (coils/turns), in cryo-Electron Microscopy (EM) maps of medium to low resolution

bioschemas.name: Emap2sec
